name: A Jupiter Story - Episode I Free: The Earth Harvest Operation
name_original: A Jupiter Story - Episode I Free: The Earth Harvest Operation
description:
The time has come for you to be the pilot of an official space action. During your mission you will face countless adventures and danger, your way is filled with weapons fire and explosions. Not only enemy spacecrafts but various dangers and obstacles will make your ascending harder. Watch out, this is no action movie, this is the reality! You will have to leave the safe planet Earth, but you will stay in the Solar System. Your task is to guide your spaceship safely through space stations, several moons and the endless cosmos to Jupiter, and collect the most ingredients possible to build the Energy Cell. Your mission is critical to save the colony stranded on Jupiter. Time is running out, the threat is growing. So lift off and ascend all the way to Jupiter and gain those kudos! Your name and story could get into the books of history in bold text!

Features:
* Unique retro spaceship shooter experience
* A game with easy drag-and-drop control
* Dual challenges: desctruct or avoid obstacles
* Lots of unlockables: special upgrades, new skins and powerful spacecrafts
* Cool powerups: slow down time, invulnerability
